QuestData.Title: Winterfin Commerce
QuestData.Description: Now that you can speak with the Winterfin, it is time for you to let them get to know you. One of the best ways to do that is to conduct business with them.$B$BThe murlocs prize clams over any other object and their only surviving merchant is Ahlurglgr. If I were you, I'd collect a handful of Winterfin clams and give them to him as a gift.$B$BThe clams can be found all over down in the trench, as well as across it in the Winterfin village and their caverns.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 5 Winterfin Clams and deliver them to Ahlurglgr at Winterfin Retreat.
QuestData.CompletionText: What's this? Who are you?$B$BYou're one of those $r things! How can you speak our tongue?
QuestData.RewardText: These are for me? Is this some sort of $r trick? No?$B$BWell then, thank you! Come back any time that you have more clams, and we'll do business!
